com.skobbler.ngx
Class SKMaps

java.lang.Object
  com.skobbler.ngx.SKMaps

public final class SKMaps
extends java.lang.Object

SKMaps provides support for general settings and management that concerns the whole SKMaps SDK.

Version:
2.5

public static final byte CONNECTIVITY_MODE_ONLINE
Indicates that the SDK is used in online mode. See setConnectivityMode(byte)

See Also:
Constant Field Values

public static final byte CONNECTIVITY_MODE_OFFLINE
Indicates that the SDK is used in offline mode. See setConnectivityMode(byte)

Method Detail

getInstance

public static SKMaps getInstance()
Return single instance of SKMaps

Returns:
single distance of SKMaps

initializeSKMaps

public void initializeSKMaps(android.content.Context context,
                             SKMapsInitSettings mapInitSettings)
Initialize the SKMaps framework with the provided settings. The settings must contain valid paths for maps, current map style folder and common resources. Note that this method has to be called only once per application.
Important : This cannot be called if the map resources were not prepared . See SKPrepareMapTextureThread . Only after is called this has to be called.

Parameters:
context -
mapInitSettings - the desired setup for SKMaps

getApiKey

public java.lang.String getApiKey()
Returns the api key.

Returns:
api key that was previous set or null if it was not set.

setApiKey

public void setApiKey(java.lang.String apiKey)
Sets the api key. Call this before initializeSKMaps(Context, SKMapsInitSettings). Meta-data tag from manifest will be ignored.

Parameters:
apiKey -

getUserId

public java.lang.String getUserId()
Returns the user id.

Returns:
the unique user id.

getObfuscatedApiKey

public java.lang.String getObfuscatedApiKey()
Returns the obfuscated developer key. Before calling this method, make sure that SKMaps#initializeSKMaps(android.content.Context, SKMapsInitSettings, String) is called.

Returns:
a string containing the obfuscated API-KEY

isSKMapsInitialized

public boolean isSKMapsInitialized()
Returns if SKMaps library is initialized.

Returns:
true, if SKMaps library is initialized false otherwise

setConnectivityMode

public void setConnectivityMode(byte connectivityMode)
Sets the connectivity mode for the library.

Parameters:
connectivityMode - can be one of the values CONNECTIVITY_MODE_ONLINE or CONNECTIVITY_MODE_OFFLINE.
Before calling this method, make sure that SKMaps#initializeSKMaps(android.content.Context, SKMapsInitSettings, String) is called.

getConnectivityMode

public byte getConnectivityMode()
Return the connectivity status of the sdk. Before calling this method, make sure that SKMaps#initializeSKMaps(android.content.Context, SKMapsInitSettings, String) is called.

Returns:
connectivity status of the sdk. Can be one of CONNECTIVITY_MODE_ONLINE or CONNECTIVITY_MODE_OFFLINE.

setOnlineConnectionNotificationDelay

public void setOnlineConnectionNotificationDelay(int delay)
Sets the delay between online connection notifications.
Before calling this method, make sure that SKMaps#initializeSKMaps(android.content.Context, SKMapsInitSettings, String) is called.

Parameters:
delay - delay (in seconds), if set to zero notifications are disabled

finalizeLibrary

public boolean finalizeLibrary()
Finalizes the map library. Disposes all objects and frees all allocated memory.

Returns:
true if this succeed

setProxy

public boolean setProxy(SKProxySettings proxySettings)
Change proxy internet connection. If proxyIp is empty or proxyPort is 0, the proxy will be disabled.

Parameters:
proxySettings -
Returns:
return true in case of enabled proxy or false if the proxy is disabled
Before calling this method, make sure that SKMaps#initializeSKMaps(android.content.Context, SKMapsInitSettings, String) is called.

enableProxy

public void enableProxy(boolean enable)
Enables/disables proxy.

Parameters:
enable -
Before calling this method, make sure that SKMaps#initializeSKMaps(android.content.Context, SKMapsInitSettings, String) is called.

setDownloadListener

public void setDownloadListener(SKMapsDownloadListener downloadListener)
Sets the download listener.

Parameters:
downloadListener -
Before calling this method, make sure that SKMaps#initializeSKMaps(android.content.Context, SKMapsInitSettings, String) is called.

unzipFile

public int unzipFile(java.lang.String sourceName,
                     java.lang.String destinationFolder)
Unzips file to specified destination.

Parameters:
sourceName - name of the file to unzip, including path
destinationFolder - path to folder where to unzip the content of the archive.
Returns:
Positive value: no. of files extracted, 0: if empty archive, negative value: this is an error code

Has to be called before exiting the application.
